member.name: T:Validation.PrivateErrorHelpers
member.summary: Common utility methods used by the various error detection and reporting classes.

member.name: M:Validation.PrivateErrorHelpers.TrimGenericWrapper(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Trims away a given surrounding type, returning just the generic type argument, if the given type is in fact a generic type with just one type argument and the generic type matches a given wrapper type. Otherwise, it returns the original type.
member.param: The type to trim, or return unmodified.
The SomeType<> generic type definition to trim away from if it is present.
member.returns: , if it is not a generic type instance of ; otherwise the type argument.

member.summary: Helper method that formats string arguments.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_EmptyArray
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must contain at least one element..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_EmptyString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' cannot be an empty string ("") or start with the null character..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_EnumNotDefined
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be set to a value defined by the enum '{1}'..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_NullElement
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' cannot contain a null (Nothing in Visual Basic) element..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_StructIsDefault
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' cannot be the default value defined by '{1}'..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.Argument_Whitespace
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The parameter "{0}" cannot consist entirely of white space characters..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.InternalExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An internal error occurred. Please contact customer support..

member.name: P:Validation.Strings.ServiceMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot find an instance of the {0} service..
